SELECT DISTINCT notification.*,
notification_reminder.id AS notification_reminder__id, notification_reminder.notification_id AS notification_reminder__notification_id, notification_reminder.reminder_date AS notification_reminder__reminder_date,
notification_browsing_history.notification_id AS notification_browsing_history__notification_id, notification_browsing_history.user_id AS notification_browsing_history__user_id, notification_browsing_history.viewed_date AS notification_browsing_history__viewed_date
FROM notification LEFT JOIN notification_reminder ON notification_reminder.notification_id = notification.id LEFT JOIN notification_browsing_history ON notification_browsing_history.notification_id = notification.id ORDER BY notification.id, notification_reminder.reminder_date, notification_browsing_history.user_id
